title: omfg it's unreal that lulu and janna still exist
body:
i swear to god next time im up against this stupid broken retarded champions who has been broken since ever ,i will dodge everygame im up against them even if i lose more lp for dodging

this is acutly so stupid when a  a lulu give as ms sheilds heals max hp buffs knock ups slows and cc while doing a retarded amount of damage it's acutly fucking absured how retarded this shit is without getting fixed

stupid fuking enchanter supports just pick the gold item that for some reason also gives bonus magic damage wich is sleeper op btw, alongside with the broken 4 item in one "zeke " ,and ur set to just hang urself 
it's not that im not being able to carry from midlane
it's that when i try to carry and im against this stupid champs i lose no matter what or how hard i work on my lane and in the game ,only for this brainded overlaoded kit champs to press one button and win the game, in fact how the fuck do u even improve at this game anymore when u basicly auto lose more then half of ur games just beacuse someone who have brain damage still pick those champs thinking he have any sort of skill what'sover

replies.body:
welcome to the supports of league. Lulu is the true bullshit. Janna is just for those that dont want to snoop that low.

Edit: leona/taric/bard are mans man champs. You pick those when you wanna go in and fuck shit up with class.

>Lulu is the true bullshit. Janna is just for those that dont want to snoop that low.

Was that a short joke? {{champion:45}}

> [{quoted}](name=Mysticman89,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=svyA9XgY,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-05-14T01:40:36.999+0000)
>
> Was that a short joke? {{champion:45}}

is that heightism I sense? Im offended and need a safe space.

> i swear to god next time im up against this stupid broken retarded champions who has been broken since ever ,i will dodge everygame im up against them even if i lose more lp for dodging

Dont play ranked if you dont want to make any effort.
Meanwhile I only get auto filled lux, shen and malphite. Fells bad man
